titleStmt.title: A speech delivered at a conference with the Lords, January 25, MDCXLII by occasion of the petitions from the citie of London, and the counties of Middlesex, Essex, and Hertford / by John Pym, Esquire.
titleStmt.author: Pym, John, 1584-1643.
